title: Disney Collection 1937-2008
description:
This torrent is based heavily off of the original Disney collection. Thanks go to .BONE. for his collection to make this conversion project possible.

All files:

- support any Apple device out there today (.m4v format)
- used -profile:v high -level 4.0 with ffmpeg to encode
- are tagged with meta data, as you can see below
- have embedded cover art from IMDB

Quality is based on the original compilation and wasn't really changed much by the encoding process (at least I don't think...I didn't exactly watch every single one of these). Only a format change happened to the files. Please no complaints about the low resolution of the older videos. If you have a DVD of the movie, feel free to re-encode it and upload it as a separate torrent.

Please seed. I'd love to see it stay up. Thanks!

The original collection was in .avi format, so they couldn't be used with Apple TV, iTunes, or any iOS device easily. This collection is now native, and supports the following specs:

$ ffmpeg -i Wall-E (2008).m4v
